show.description: Whether or not the model is shown.

gltf.description: The URI of a glTF model. For broadest client compatibility, the URI should be accessible via Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). The URI may also be a data URI.
gltf.title: 模型

minimumPixelSize.description: The approximate minimum pixel size of the model regardless of zoom.
minimumPixelSize.title: 最小尺寸

maximumScale.description: The maximum scale size of the model. This is used as an upper limit for `minimumPixelSize`.
maximumScale.title: 最大比例

incrementallyLoadTextures.description: Whether or not the model can be rendered before all textures have loaded.

runAnimations.description: Whether or not to run all animations defined in the glTF model.
runAnimations.title: 动画播放

shadows.description: Whether or not the model casts or receives shadows.

heightReference.description: The height reference of the model, which indicates if the position is relative to terrain or not.

silhouetteColor.description: The color of the silhouette drawn around the model.
silhouetteColor.title: 外轮廓颜色

silhouetteSize.description: The size, in pixels, of the silhouette drawn around the model.
silhouetteSize.title: 外轮廓大小

color.description: The color to blend with the model's rendered color.
color.title: 颜色

colorBlendMode.description: The mode to use for blending between `color` and the model's color.
colorBlendMode.title: 颜色混合模式

colorBlendAmount.description: The color strength when `colorBlendMode` is `MIX`. A value of 0.0 results in the model's rendered color while a value of 1.0 results in a solid color, with any value in-between resulting in a mix of the two.
colorBlendAmount.title: 颜色混合权重

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying at what distance from the camera this model will be displayed.
distanceDisplayCondition.title: 按距离显示
